sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react' import * as d3 from 'd3' const TimelineChart = ({ data, onDataReceived, onWordDataReceived }) => { const svgRef = useRef() const tooltipRef = useRef() useEffect(() => { if (data) { drawTimeline(data) } }, [data]) const drawTimeline = (data) => { const svg = d3.select(svgRef.current) svg.selectAll('*').remove() const margin = { top: 20, right: 15, bottom: 30, left: 100 } const width = +svg.attr('width') - margin.left - margin.right const height = +svg.attr('height') - margin.top - margin.bottom const x = d3 .scaleTime() .domain([ d3.min(data, (d) => d3.min(d.times, (t) => t.starting_time)), d3.max(data, (d) => d3.max(d.times, (t) => t.ending_time)), ]) .range([0, width]) const y = d3 .scaleBand() .domain(data.map((d) => d.label)) .range([0, height]) .padding(0.1) const xAxis = svg .append('g') .attr('transform', `translate(${margin.left},${height + margin.top})`) .call(d3.axisBottom(x).tickSizeOuter(0)) const yAxis = svg .append('g') .attr('transform', `translate(${margin.left},${margin.top})`) .call(d3.axisLeft(y).tickSize(0).tickPadding(6)) const barsGroup = svg .append('g') .attr('transform', `translate(${margin.left},${margin.top})`) const colorScale = d3.scaleOrdinal(d3.schemeCategory10) barsGroup .selectAll('rect') .data(data.flatMap((d) => d.times)) .enter() .append('rect') .attr('x', (d) => x(d.starting_time)) .attr('y', (d) => y(data.find((p) => p.times.includes(d)).label)) .attr('width', (d) => x(d.ending_time) - x(d.starting_time)) .attr('height', y.bandwidth()) .attr('fill', (d, i) => colorScale(i)) .on('mouseover', (event, d) => { const duration = (d.ending_time - d.starting_time) / 1000 // Duration in seconds d3.select(tooltipRef.current) .style('opacity', 1) .html( `Início: ${d3.timeFormat('%H:%M:%S')(d.starting_time)}
Fim: ${d3.timeFormat('%H:%M:%S')(d.ending_time)}
Duração: ${duration}s` ) .style('left', `${event.pageX + 10}px`) .style('top', `${event.pageY - 28}px`) }) .on('mouseout', () => { d3.select(tooltipRef.current).style('opacity', 0) }) // Configure the tooltip styling d3.select(tooltipRef.current) .style('position', 'absolute') .style('background', 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)') // Dark background .style('color', 'white') // White text .style('border', '1px solid #ccc') .style('padding', '5px') .style('border-radius', '3px') .style('opacity', 0) // Initially hidden .style('pointer-events', 'none') .style('transition', 'opacity 0.3s ease') .style('z-index', 10) } return (
) } export default TimelineChart
